title: Drawing, Views of Artisana Volcano from or near Quito, and a Cloudy Sky over a Mountain Ridge, Ecuador, June 23, 1857
title_raw: Views of Artisana Volcano from or near Quito, and a Cloudy Sky over a Mountain Ridge, Ecuador
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on cream-colored paper
markings:
Recto:  Stamped in ink, at lower left: Lugt 457c
Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center:  Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with numbers throughout, and at upper left: Artisana [beneath something erased]; again, at upper center:  Magnificent effect / 5 cloud lakey neutral; again, at upper right: 2- upper part of  mountain / glowing with gold & orange / 3- Lower part in shadow from  / cloud silver beautiful/  4- sky streaked with warm / color; again, at center right:  June 23rd / 57; again, at lower left:  2- Brilliant orange light / fading 3 & 4 into a / rather luminous delicate / shadow / 5- Dark / 6- silvery blue / shadow; and at bottom right:  June 23d / 57
description: Horizontal view of Artisana peaks and a lower mountain rising above the clouds and low ridges on the upper portion of the sheet with a cloudy sky over ridges separated by a line on the lower portion.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Views of Artisana Volcano from or near Quito, and a Cloudy Sky over a Mountain Ridge, Ecuador, June 23, 1857. Graphite, brush and white gouache on cream-colored paper. 
Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-242
